text: Grand Ayatollah Sayyid Mohammad Baqir Shirazi (; 26 November 1931 – 13 May 2014) was an Iranian Twelver Shi'a Marja. Shirazi died in Iran from a long illness, aged 82.Funeral of Grand Ayatollah Hajj Sayyed Mohammad Bagher Shirazi in Mashhad , ABNA News, 17 May 2014, accessed 15 June 2014 ==References== ==Other websites== * المرجع السيد محمد باقر الشيرازي والعلامة الشيخ علي الكوراني والعلامة الشيخ محمد باقر المقدسي *السيد محمد باقر الشيرازي Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Iran Category:Iranian Muslims
title: Mohammad Baqer Shirazi
